Professional Oil Stain Removal

Specialized treatment for tough automotive stains

Oil and automotive fluid stains can be some of the most stubborn and unsightly marks on your driveway or parking area. These stains not only detract from your property's appearance but can also penetrate deep into concrete and asphalt surfaces. Our specialized oil stain removal services in St. Catharines and the Niagara region use professional-grade degreasers, hot water extraction, and proven techniques to significantly improve or eliminate these tough stains.

What's Included

Comprehensive service features designed to deliver exceptional results.

Hot water extraction treatment

Professional-grade degreasers

Deep penetrating stain removal

Fresh and old stain treatment

Concrete and asphalt safe methods

Environmentally responsible products

Multiple treatment applications

Stain prevention advice

Benefits You'll Experience

Improved Appearance

Removing oil stains dramatically improves your driveway's appearance and your property's overall curb appeal.

Surface Protection

Oil and chemicals can break down concrete and asphalt over time. Removal helps protect your surface investment.

Environmental Benefits

Proper oil stain removal prevents harmful chemicals from washing into storm drains and local waterways.

Property Value

Clean, stain-free surfaces contribute to better property value and marketability.

Our Professional Process

Step-by-step approach ensuring consistent, high-quality results.

1

Stain Assessment

We evaluate the type, age, and extent of oil stains to determine the most effective treatment approach.

2

Pre-Treatment Application

We apply specialized degreasers and allow them to penetrate and break down the oil compounds.

3

Hot Water Extraction

We use hot water and pressure washing to extract loosened oil and cleaning solutions from the surface.

4

Results Evaluation

We assess the results and may recommend additional treatments for particularly stubborn stains.
